TopicTitle: Editing Ven's stock revamp parts for shuttle replicas

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Lately I've been playing around with making shuttle replicas, but I have a problem when making them, I'm missing orange tanks.

Ven's mod has them but they are of a smaller size (2.5 instead of 3.75), so I'm here to ask you, is there a way to edit the interested parts (the CryoX tanks) to fit my needs?

I tried installing tweak scale but there isn't the option to make them bigger.

You may find luck adding a ModuleManager patch which adds the Tweakscale module to the orange tank you want. If you are not an adept of the arcane Patch, simple copy-paste will suffice.

Alternatively, multiply the scaleFactor field in the cfg file by 1.5 (to resize from 2.5m to 3.75m), and the resource capacities by 3.375 (1.5 cubed). Dry mass and cost might be somewhere between 2.25 (1.5 squared- proportional to area) and 3.375 (1.5 cubed- proportional to volume).
@Mecateo,you could check these,and use only thanks.
Keep your eyes peeled on SSTU as well...

On 24/11/2016 at 4:55 AM, 0111narwhalz said:

You may find luck adding a ModuleManager patch which adds the Tweakscale module to the orange tank you want. If you are not an adept of the arcane Patch, simple copy-paste will suffice.

Alternatively, multiply the scaleFactor field in the cfg file by 1.5 (to resize from 2.5m to 3.75m), and the resource capacities by 3.375 (1.5 cubed). Dry mass and cost might be somewhere between 2.25 (1.5 squared- proportional to area) and 3.375 (1.5 cubed- proportional to volume).

that worked out perfectly, thanks!
